title: Chicken Stew with Dumplings
ingredients: ['2 (295g) tins cream of chicken condensed soup', '750ml water', '120g celery, chopped', '2 onions, quartered', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon chicken seasoning', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '5 carrots, sliced', '275g frozen peas', '4 potatoes, quartered', '360g dumpling mix', '325ml milk or as required']
